devdoc.details: This contract is used to store the state of the Hashbuzz contract

params.newCampaigner: Address of the user having campaigner role to be used here

addFungibleAmount(address,address,uint25.details: Fungible token added to the campaigner account.

params.tokenAmount: Amount added to the campaigner account

associateToken(address,bool).details: Adds or removes a token from the whitelist.

params.isWhitelisted: Boolean flag to mark the token as whitelisted or not.

getAllWhitelistedTokens().details: Retrieves all whitelisted addresses for a given token type.

returns._0: An array of addresses that are whitelisted for the given token type.

getCampaignBalance(string).details: Balance alloted to the camppaign to see.

getFungibleCampaignBalance(string,addres.details: Token balance held by the campaign.

returns.res: The balance of the fungible token for the campaign.

getFungibleTokenBalance(address,address).details: Retrieves the balance of a fungible token for a specific campaigner.

params.campaigner: Address of the campaigner's solidity address.
params.tokenId: Solidity address used for the account.

returns.res: The balance of the fungible token.

getHbarBalance(address).details: Balance holded by the user to see.

isTokenWhitelisted(address).details: Checks if a specific token address is whitelisted for a given token type.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to check.

returns._0: Boolean flag indicating if the token is whitelisted.

params.amount: Total amount campaigner wanted to reimburse
